title: Astreya Names Monica Hushen CFO/COO
text:
SANTA CLARA, Calif., Feb. 27, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Today, Astreya announces the appointment of Monica Hushen as Chief Financial Officer / Chief Operations Officer effective immediately.
Monica has 25 years' experience scaling global private and public enterprises, having held both Finance and Operations leadership roles. She previously held the CFO/Operations role for Wonder Workshop leading finance, accounting, supply chain and manufacturing. Prior to that, Monica has led growth strategies as CFO for 15+ years in both startups and established companies, such as NewRoads, uBeam, HashFast, Soundhawk, and ECS Refining. She has also held Operations/Finance leadership roles at HP, Palm, Apple, and GE. In her tenure, she has secured hundreds of millions of dollars of shareholder value improvements, operational efficiencies, and financing, and has established growth strategies with associated processes and disciplines for ensuring execution amidst high growth.
"I couldn't be more thrilled to welcome Monica to Astreya where she will make an immediate impact amidst a period of expansion for the company," said Edwin Miller, CEO of Astreya. "I am particularly impressed with Monica's depth of experience and understanding with transformative companies. I believe that Monica's skillset fits well with the strength of our existing Finance organization and her broad range of capabilities will complement our experienced management team as we continue to deliver industry leading service to our customers"
Miller added, "Monica also brings with her a proven track record of supply chain and operational leadership. she is a motivational leader with a reputation for aligning people and resources to drive economic growth."
"I can't imagine a more exciting time to join Astreya," Hushen said. "2017 was a year for exceptional growth for Astreya. Edwin and his executive team recognize and appreciate the opportunity for innovation in Managed Services, and I'm delighted to be a part of it."
In her role as Chief Finance Officer, Hushen will oversee the global finance and accounting organization.
ABOUT ASTREYA
Astreya is a premier IT solutions provider offering strategic and tactical services for some of the world's most recognizable and innovative organizations. Astreya was founded in 2001 as a staffing company and value-added re-seller. The company quickly grew to include 24/7 end-user compute support, program management, network management and data center operations. Demand for Astreya's expertise increased, which led the evolution from staffing to Astreya Managed Services and the formation of Astreya Professional Services. Headquartered in the heart of Silicon Valley, Astreya is committed to delivering technology enabled services to fuel digital transformation. Astreya employs over 800 IT professionals in more than 35 countries. For more information, visit the company's website at www.astreya.com . Connect with Astreya on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.
